      • getSeriesByName

        public java.util.List<Series> getSeriesByName(java.lang.String search,
                                     User user)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches series with a name corresponding to the search term. The search is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        search - Name to be queried.
        user - User whose series are queried. If the user is admin all users' series are queried.
        Returns:
        A list of series.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                     User user)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Searches series with a name corresponding to all the search terms. The search is not case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        searchList - Names to be queried.
        user - User whose series are queried. If the user is admin all users' series are queried.
        Returns:
        A list of series.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
